name: There's a whale and a way
name_original: There's a whale and a way
description:
Global game jam game 2021. 

A whale from Earth is sucked into a vortex in space and needs to find his way back home by trading supplies with the planets he visits. To move the camera use W = up,A = left ,S = down ,D = right. To move the whale left click.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/theres-whale-and-way-3
Team:
CandiceCandice
delirium
CollinViz
